# Medication Tools Sources

## Licensing Note
All formulas and tables in this skill are derived from published research or official clinical guidance and are freely implementable with proper citation. This project uses original descriptions and does not copy proprietary content.

## Corticosteroid Equivalencies
- Australian Immunisation Handbook table of prednisolone-equivalent dosing (adapted from Furst and Saag, 2023).

## QTc Correction Formulas
- Bazett HC. Heart 1920;7:353-370. (Bazett formula)
- Fridericia LS. Acta Med Scand 1920;53:469-486. (Fridericia formula)
- Sagie A, et al. Am J Cardiol 1992;70:797-801. (Framingham formula)
- Hodges M, et al. (Hodges formula)
- Rautaharju PM, et al. (Rautaharju correction)
- ACEP Toxicology section review of QTc correction formulas.

## Opioid Equianalgesic Conversion
- American Board of Family Medicine: Opioid equianalgesic dosing chart (Pain Education Project).
- Indian Health Service (HHS): Safe opioid prescribing guidance on incomplete cross-tolerance dose reduction.

## Warfarin Dosing
- AAFP: Updated guidelines on outpatient anticoagulation (dose adjustment and INR management).
- AAFP: Outpatient management of anticoagulation therapy (dose adjustment principles).
